mapper.sql: SELECT user_info_id, user_id, name, surname, banned_indicator, banned_to, points, bankrupt_times
mapper.select: FROM user_info ui JOIN users u ON ui.user_id = u.user_id WHERE ui.name LIKE UPPER(#{searchText}) || '%' OR ui.surname LIKE UPPER(#{searchText}) || '%' OR u.username LIKE UPPER(#{searchText}) || '%'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_info (user_id, name, surname, banned_indicator, banned_to, points, bankrupt_times ) VALUES (#{userId, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{surname, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bannedIndicator, jdbcType=CHAR}, #{bannedTo, jdbcType=DATE}, #{points, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{bankruptTimes, jdbcType=INTEGER} )
